## Description {#details}

Specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/shared/spssequence">SPSSequence&lt;char&gt;</a> -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;char&gt;</a> serialization.

On deserialize, points directly into the input buffer.
